headline: Jim Cramer on Palo Alto: “I Think It Is a Buy”
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Answering a caller’s query about the stock during the lightning round, Cramer said: “I think that Nikesh Arora does a great job. I slighted him too much. I said so many good things about CrowdStrike earlier. Palo Alto’s a terrific company […]
